contentList.content: A chest of magical helmets, each humming with silent spells. A few look back when you stare too long. One may or may not be thinking.
Inside magical gloves of every sort - some spark at the fingertips, others flex like they’re waiting to cast a spell on their own. One pair waved. Probably.
A chest lined with enchanted capes - some shimmer like starlight, others vanish the moment you blink. Each one seems to carry a breeze, even when the air is still.

A chest full of enchanted boots, each pair humming with latent magic. Useful, powerful, stylish and just magical enough to make Gale eye them like a midnight snack. Best keep the lid closed when he’s around.
The chest hums faintly with arcane energy. Inside, armor pieces shimmer with enchantments - runes etched into metal, fabric that resists flame, and plates that feel far too light for their size.
